items.name: TRADITIONAL
items.description: Fresh dough, delicious sauce, 100% real romano and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: HOMESTYLE
items.description: A sweeter red sauce with sprinkled romano cheese (No Mozzarella). An 'old Italian favorite.'

items.name: POORMANâ€™S
items.description: Vegetable oil, Italian spices, romano and mozzarella cheese. (No red sauce.)

items.name: VEGETABLE
items.description: Broccoli, cauliflower and a special blend of spices covered in a delicious white sauce and topped with cheddar and mozzarella.

items.name: TACO
items.description: Mexican-spiced ground beef, light tomato sauce, cheddar and mozzarella. Topped with fresh lettuce and tomatoes.

items.name: THE ULTIMATE
items.description: 5 Toppings! Pepperoni, sausage, onions, mushrooms and green peppers topped with mozzarella.

items.name: TRIPLE CHEESE & BACON
items.description: Crispy bacon tops off a trio of romano, cheddar & mozzarella cheeses.

items.name: MEATBALL
items.description: Lots of delicious meatballs with sauce and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: MEXICAN
items.description: Spiced beef, chicken, banana peppers, sauce, olives, cheddar and mozzarella.

items.name: CHEESE
items.description: Fresh dough stuffed with our famous tomato sauce, romano, mozzarella & 100% real ricotta cheese.
